name: brute-force-blocker-feed
label: BruteForceBlocker Feed
description:
BruteForceBlocker Feed it's main purpose is to block SSH bruteforce attacks via firewall.This connector facilitates automated operations related to fetching the list of IPs blocklist.

This connector has a dependency on the Threat Intel Management Solution Pack. Install the Solution Pack before enabling ingestion of Threat Feeds from this source.

fields.title: Service
fields.name: service
fields.description: Review and select the URL of the BruteForceBlocker Feed service to which you will connect and retrieve data. You can choose https://danger.rulez.sk/projects/bruteforceblocker/blist.php.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.

operations.description: Retrieves a list of all indicators from BruteForceBlocker Feed.
operations.title: Fetch Indicators

parameters.title: Last Pull Time
parameters.description: Last time the feeds were pulled
parameters.name: last_pull_time
